testsuite.system-out: Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Verify mmt country & currency selection section present. Step 3 : Click on mmt country & currency selection section present. Step 4 : Select country USA from dropdown. Step 5 : Click on apply button. FAIL : verifyCountryCurrencyWidget

Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Click on flights logo. Step 3 : Click on round trip radio button. Step 4 : Enter ahmedabad in from textbox. Step 5 : Enter singapre in to textbox. Step 6 : Select departure date from opened calander. Step 7 : Select return date from opened calander. Step 8 : Click on select travellers. Step 9 : Select 2 adults. Step 10 : Click on apply button. Step 11 : Click on search button. Step 12 : Verify all flights shows from and to city as per selection while search. PASS : verifySearchFlight
